languages.text: "Как видите — признание из первых уст. Какие еще доказательства нужны трибуналу?"

traits.locale_text: "Как видите — признание из первых уст. Какие еще доказательства нужны трибуналу?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "As you can see, this is a confession straight from the horse's mouth. What other evidence can the court possibly seek?"
languages.original_text: "Как видите — признание из первых уст. Какие еще доказательства нужны трибуналу?"

traits.locale_text: "As you can see, this is a confession straight from the horse's mouth. What other evidence can the court possibly require?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As you can see, this is a confession straight from the horse's mouth. What other evidence can the court possibly require?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As you can see, this is a confession straight from the horse's mouth. What other evidence can the court possibly seek?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As you can see, this is a confession straight from the horse's mouth. What other evidence can the court possibly seek?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As you can see, this is a confession straight from the horse's mouth. What other evidence can the court possibly seek?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As you can see, this is a confession straight from the horse's mouth. What other evidence can the court possibly seek?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Nous avons obtenu les aveux de la bête elle-même. De quels autres éléments de preuve la cour pourrait-elle avoir besoin ? »
languages.original_text: "As you can see, this is a confession straight from the horse's mouth. What other evidence can the court possibly seek?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons obtenu les aveux de la bête elle-même. De quels autres éléments de preuve la cour pourrait-elle avoir besoin ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “如你所见，证人已经彻底招供了。法院还需要什么其他证据吗？”
languages.original_text: "As you can see, this is a confession straight from the horse's mouth. What other evidence can the court possibly seek?"

traits.locale_text: “如你所见，证人已经彻底招供了。法院还需要什么其他证据吗？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「お分かりのように、これは当の本人から直接出た自白だ。本法廷において、これ以上の証拠が求められるだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "As you can see, this is a confession straight from the horse's mouth. What other evidence can the court possibly seek?"

traits.locale_text: 「お分かりのように、これは当の本人から直接出た自白だ。本法廷において、これ以上の証拠が求められるだろうか？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Also doch, ein Geständnis direkt aus erster Hand. Welchen weiteren Beweis braucht der Hof jetzt noch?"
languages.original_text: "As you can see, this is a confession straight from the horse's mouth. What other evidence can the court possibly seek?"

traits.locale_text: "Also doch, ein Geständnis direkt aus erster Hand. Welchen weiteren Beweis braucht der Hof jetzt noch?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Como pueden ver, se trata de una confesión de primera mano y sin paliativos. ¿Qué más pruebas necesita el tribunal?».
languages.original_text: "As you can see, this is a confession straight from the horse's mouth. What other evidence can the court possibly seek?"

traits.locale_text: «Como pueden ver, se trata de una confesión de primera mano y sin paliativos. ¿Qué más pruebas necesita el tribunal?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Gördüğünüz üzere itiraf, direkt olarak birinci ağızdan gelmiştir. Divan başka bir kanıt sunulmasına gerek duymuyor olsa gerek?"
languages.original_text: "As you can see, this is a confession straight from the horse's mouth. What other evidence can the court possibly seek?"

traits.locale_text: "Gördüğünüz üzere itiraf direkt olarak birinci ağızdan gelmiştir. Divan başka bir kanıt sunulmasına gerek duymuyor olsa gerek?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
